text: “Basi jenumanja galagatilagani chilichose chanchisachile changawaga Jwalakwe.” Jilani: “Chisimu wakwasika ni awala watachilijasikasya (Mbepo) achimisyene kwisa soni mawasa gao lisiku lya Kiyama (ligongo lya itendo yao yangalumbana yawaliji nkutenda kuduniya), manyililani yanti kwalakweko ni kwasika kwakuonechela.”
